Articles.Content:
Greetings, who ever is reading this. I tried to attach a LV-T45 "Swivel" Liquid Fuel Engine to fuel containers, (FL-T100 Fuel Tank). The first time I tried it, it launched properly. But the second times I tried to launch, it stopped working. I tried replacing the fuel tank, or using another variant, but it would still refuse to launch. I am very new to the game, so I would really appreciate it if you told me what I am doing incorrectly. Please and thankyou.
Edit: Thankyou, I forgot to throttle up the engine and now its working. Thank you for the help!

Edited October 18, 2020 by Sharcguy100

With liquid fuel engines, you have to make sure you have thrust.  On the left side of the navball is a gauge that looks like a speedometer; that shows how much thrust you are generating.  Increase thrust with the left Shift, and decrease with the left CTRL.  You can go maximum thrust by hitting Z, and killing thrust entirely with X.
Did you remember to throttle the engine up? That's the most common thing for new players to forget to do. That engine has a throttle, and you probably want to hit Z to make it go.
